creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: two paneled woven fabric with alternating stripes and plain fabric; ornamental embroidered birds and other figures in red, gold and black thread; embroidered diamond patterns in red, gold and cream; woven red tassels at each corner with cream and lavender bands at top of each tassel; small fold of fabric at top which is hemmed with red thread
title: Tzute
